SELECT
FROM article a LEFT JOIN `article_to_tag` att ON att.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN `article_tag` at ON at.id = att.tag_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT("%", #{title}), "%")
AND at.tag_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT("%", #{articleTag}), "%")
GROUP BY a.id
